synopsis.text:
His name is Bakabon, and along with his family, they are the masters of turning the mundane into the absurd! With a father who is a self-proclaimed 'Great Philosopher' and a child prodigy for a son, the Bakabon family brings laughter to everyone around them through their silly antics and eccentric behavior. From fishing in puddles to playing with invisible dogs, there's never a dull moment with the Bakabon family.

Despite his reputation for causing chaos, Papa Bakabon is always on a quest for answers, leaving no stone unturned in his pursuit of philosophical enlightenment. And while his unconventional methods may lead to disastrous results, his unique perspective on life has earned him a loyal following of townspeople seeking his advice.

Tensai Bakabon, the child prodigy, joins his father on his philosophical adventures, much to the dismay of those around them. But even as they drive their neighbors crazy with their antics, the Bakabon family remains a beloved fixture in their community.

With a former genius for a patriarch, the Bakabon family deals with all the crazy problems he and his old friends cause around the neighborhood. So come join the Bakabon family for a wild ride filled with laughter, absurdity, and a whole lot of heart!
